import React from 'react' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const Main = (props) => { const { id, name, shop, price, today_date, note } = props; const [edit_switch, set_edit_switch] = useState(false) const name_switch = edit_switch ? :

{name}

return (

{name}

{shop}

${price}

{today_date}

) } export default Main
